definition[0]: a stupid person or someone who has done something stupid
example[0]: What a fool she had been to think that he would stay.
example[1]: Like a fool, I accepted straight away.
definition[1]: a man whose job was to entertain a king or other powerful people in the past, by doing tricks, singing funny songs etc
definition[2]: to trick someone into believing something that is not true
example[4]: You can’t fool me with that old excuse.
example[6]: I was fooled into believing their promises.
example[7]: What did you say a fool thing like that for?
